name: Butterfly Boogie
description:
Controls:

Player 1:

W - Forward

D - Backward

Player 2:

Arrow Key Up - Forward

Arrow Key Down - Background

**This game contains screen wrapping. Continue moving forward after touching the flower to continue!**

This game was made as a practice project with the game engine Godot! Any feedback is appreciated!

Thank you for playing <(^-^<)
